title: Dashboard Widgets Load Performance
description: Verify that all dashboard widgets load under 2 seconds with greater than 99.5% data accuracy.

steps.description: Navigate to the real-time sales dashboard page after login.
Measure and confirm that all widgets fully render within 2 seconds.
Validate displayed KPI data against API responses to ensure data accuracy is above 99.5%.

title: Customer Event Tracking Completeness
description: Check that customer event tracking captures over 99% of user interactions and updates segments automatically.

steps.description: Simulate various user interactions such as clicks, page views, and form submissions on the dashboard and analytics pages.
Confirm that PostHog event tracking logs the interactions at a capture rate exceeding 99%.
Verify that customer segmentation on analytics page updates automatically based on captured events.

title: Inventory Low Stock Alert Triggering
description: Validate that low stock alerts trigger correctly based on configured reorder points and ABC categorization.

steps.description: Reduce inventory levels of test products to below their reorder threshold.
Verify that a low stock alert notification appears in the Inventory Management interface.
Confirm that products are correctly categorized into ABC classes as per inventory rules.

title: Order Search and Bulk Update Operations
description: Verify search functionality across orders, ability to filter with multiple criteria, and perform bulk status updates smoothly up to 100 orders.

steps.description: Navigate to the Order Management page.
Search orders using various filters including date ranges, order status, and customer names.
Validate that search results match the input criteria accurately.
Select up to 100 orders from search results and perform a bulk status update.
Confirm the bulk update completes without errors and statuses reflect the change.
Ensure email notifications trigger correctly for updated orders.

title: Financial Reporting and Forecasting Accuracy
description: Test generation and accuracy of financial dashboards and forecasting models, including automated daily report creation and email distribution.

steps.description: Navigate to the financial reporting dashboard.
Verify that live data matches expected business data inputs with high accuracy.
Generate and export detailed Excel financial reports.
Validate exported reports are accurate and well-formatted.
Trigger forecast model update for budget planning.
Check correctness of forecast values against historical data trends.
Confirm that automated daily financial reports are generated and emailed successfully.

title: Customer Behavior Analytics and Segmentation
description: Validate functionality of customer segmentation, funnel analysis, and cohort tracking features on the analytics page.

steps.description: Navigate to the Analytics page.
Apply filters to segment customers by demographics, purchase behavior, and lifecycle stage.
Confirm that the segmentation results update dynamically and accurately.
Analyze behavior funnels including drop-off rates and conversion metrics.
Verify funnel visualizations display correct data and respond to filter changes.
Review cohort tracking reports over defined periods.
Ensure cohort retention metrics and graphs are accurate and reflect expected user return patterns.

title: Order Management - Customer Profile Integration
description: Ensure order details display accurate linked customer profiles with search, filtering, and communication history accessible.

steps.description: Access an order detail from the Orders page.
Verify associated customer profile details load correctly.
Search orders by customer name or email.
Confirm search results accurately reflect customer order associations.
View customer's communication history linked to orders.
Ensure communication logs are accessible and correctly linked.

title: Export Functionality for Dashboards and Reports
description: Verify export capabilities for dashboards, inventory reports, and financial data generate correct downloadable files in expected formats.

steps.description: Navigate to dashboard or report page with export option.
Trigger export of data as Excel or CSV file.
Confirm exported file downloads and opens without error.
Validate exported data accuracy and format correctness compared to on-screen data.

title: User Authentication and Navigation Flow
description: Verify secure login, logout, and navigation to main application pages with correct routing and UI responsiveness.

steps.description: Open application and navigate to login page.
Submit valid user credentials.
Confirm successful login and redirect to Dashboard page.
Navigate sequentially to Analytics, Orders, Inventory, Customers, and Settings pages using sidebar navigation.
Verify each page loads correctly without errors and UI adapts responsively.
Perform logout action.
Ensure user is redirected to login page and session is cleared.

title: Notification System Real-Time Alerts
description: Validate real-time notifications and alerts appear correctly for events such as low stock, order updates, and system messages in the notification center.

steps.description: Trigger events like low stock in inventory and bulk order status updates.
Confirm notifications appear immediately in the Notification Center component.
Open Notification Center and review alert details.
Verify alerts provide accurate information and clear correctly after user dismissal.

title: Error Handling on Invalid Data Inputs
description: Test system validation and error handling on invalid inputs across key forms including order search, inventory adjustments, and financial forecast updates.

steps.description: Enter invalid date formats, strings in numeric fields, or empty required fields in order search and inventory forms.
Verify form validation prevents submission and displays meaningful error messages.
Submit financial forecast update with out-of-range or malformed data.
Check system gracefully handles errors and provides clear user feedback without crashing.

title: Scalability Under Load
description: Assess system performance and responsiveness when handling large datasets, such as 10,000+ customer records and orders.

steps.description: Load pages with large amounts of data in orders, customers, and inventory.
Verify UI responsiveness remains acceptable and no crashes occur.
Perform bulk operations and exports on large datasets.
Confirm operations complete successfully with reasonable response time.
